OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ISyncMessagePosterService Interface Reference

This Service deals with posting events to a (local or remote) host This is used for secure communications between regions and the grid service for things such as EventQueueMessages and posting of a grid wide notice. More...

 Post a request to all hosts that we have This is asyncronous.

Detailed Description

This Service deals with posting events to a (local or remote) host This is used for secure communications between regions and the grid service for things such as EventQueueMessages and posting of a grid wide notice.
